thread.title: Brazil Senate Reconfirms Attorney General Janot -
thread.title_full: Brazil Senate Reconfirms Attorney General Janot - WSJ

author: Luciana Magalhaes
title: Brazil Senate Reconfirms Attorney General Janot -
text:
SÃO PAULO—Brazil’s top prosecutor will keep his job for another two years in the midst of a corruption investigation that has touched the highest levels of the nation’s business and government.
The Senate voted late Wednesday to retain Rodrigo Janot as Brazil’s attorney general; his current term ends Sept. 17. Mr. Janot’s office is directing a sweeping probe that has ensnared business leaders and politicians accused of participating in a decadelong graft ring that looted billions from state-run oil giant Petróleo...
